publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3490 Aileen Campbell: Travis Trek, The Legends—That the Parliament congratulates Larkhall resident Scott Cunningham and his guide dog, Travis, on embarking on their fifth long-distance fundraising walk, following the route of the West Highland Way from north to south in aid of the Guide Dogs charity; notes that the pair have so far raised over £60,000 for the charity in their previous expeditions and have set new records as the first blind man and guide dog pair to walk each of the West Highland Way, the Southern Upland Way, the Speyside Way and the Pennine Way; further notes that on this trip they will be joined by football legends and supported by the Royal Marines, and looks forward to the continuing success of Scott and Travis on their treks. Supported by: Bill Kidd*, Alasdair Allan*, Kenneth Gibson*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Sandra White*
S3M-3490 Travis Trek, The Legends (lodged on 23 February 2009) Robert Brown*, Jamie Hepburn*, Christina McKelvie*, Bob Doris*, Stuart McMillan*, Angela Constance*, Gil Paterson*, Jim Tolson*
S3M-3490 Travis Trek, The Legends (lodged on 23 February 2009) Jamie Stone*

S3M-3490 Aileen Campbell: Travis Trek, The Legends—That the Parliament congratulates Larkhall resident Scott Cunningham and his guide dog, Travis, on embarking on their fifth long-distance fundraising walk, following the route of the West Highland Way from north to south in aid of the Guide Dogs charity; notes that the pair have so far raised over £60,000 for the charity in their previous expeditions and have set new records as the first blind man and guide dog pair to walk each of the West Highland Way, the Southern Upland Way, the Speyside Way and the Pennine Way; further notes that on this trip they will be joined by football legends and supported by the Royal Marines, and looks forward to the continuing success of Scott and Travis on their treks. Supported by: Bill Kidd, Alasdair Allan, Kenneth Gibson, Joe FitzPatrick, Sandra White, Robert Brown, Jamie Hepburn, Christina McKelvie, Bob Doris, Stuart McMillan, Angela Constance, Gil Paterson, Jim Tolson, Jamie Stone
